profiles/Moshe-משה-Hoffman.content:

Death:April 7, 1973 at Perth, Australia
Occupation:wheelwright, publican, businessman

Children:Aaron Harry אהרון Hoffman, Bella Hoffman, Hyman Judah Hoffman, Wolf Hoffman, Alyce Breazeale, Jack Hoffman
